meanings.definition: A type of Italian almond-flavored cookie.
meanings.sent1: I love to bake amaretti cookies with my grandma.
meanings.sent2: The bakery down the street sells delicious amaretti.
meanings.sent3: The amaretti cookies were so good, they disappeared in minutes!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a batch of freshly baked amaretti.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of amaretti filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: Plural form of 'amaretto', a sweet almond-flavored liqueur.
meanings.sent1: We ordered a round of amaretti at the bar.
meanings.sent2: The dessert menu featured various cocktails with amaretti.
meanings.sent3: The party was a hit, thanks to the endless supply of amaretti shots.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight danced on the lake like a glass of shimmering amaretti.
meanings.sent5: The scent of amaretti lingered in the air, tempting everyone to take a sip.
